Title: Requires owners of certain large vessels to establish whale strike reduction policies
Summary: Requires owners of certain large vessels to establish whale strike reduction policies; establishes penalties for failure to establish such policies.
LawCode: Add Art 13 Title 9 §§13-0901 & 13-0903, En Con L; add Art 11-A §150, Nav L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law and the navigation law, in relation to establishing whale strike reduction policies for large vessels
